short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collapses files that match supplied keywords in githubs file viewer for PR's. Customizable in options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collapses files on github that have a filename that matches a supplied list of keywords. By default the list just contains 'translations', but can be extendable in the extensions options!

Also has a toggle for empty/deleted files in the options
